New Records: The Cavaliers are 8-0 for the first time in 48 years
Key Match Events: Evan Mobley's block, full-court dribble and thunderous dunk were'superstar stuff'
Darius Garland scored at least 30 points four times in the first eight games this year
Garland's 39 points against the Bucks was his best scoring night in nearly two years
Pre-Game Insights: Coach Kenny Atkinson mentioned a 'quiet confidence' about the team, but also humility and a sense of knowing they have to take the next step
Post-Match Reflections: The Cavaliers are in a unique position where they can play carefree and for each other, with no contract pressure or financial stress
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Cavaliers have insisted for years that Garland can thrive in an off-ball role and are being rewarded with his improved performance
The Bucks are 1-6 to start the season, with championship aspirations but struggling to meet expectations
Others: The Cavaliers have a strong roster with players signed for at least three years, including Garland, Mitchell, Mobley, Jarrett Allen, Max Strus and Isaac Okoro
